required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Malnutrition in Primary School Children
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Malnutrition inPrimary School Children in Tema City, Sohag Governorate, Egypt to Evaluate the Most Significant Factors Affecting it.

brief_summary.textblock: Study of malnutrition in primary school age children aim to asses the prevelance of malnutrition amoung the children in this age group and also ldintified the factors that affect in malnutrition between the children and the study will done in two primary school one present in rural area and another in urban area to compare the factor and the result that affect in both two different area

detailed_description.textblock:
Study of malnutrition in primary school age children aim to asses the prevelance of malnutrition amoung the children in this age group and also ldintified the factors that affect in malnutrition between the children and the study will done in two primary school one present in rural area and another in urban area to compare the factor and the result that affect in both two different area investigators in this study will use anthropometric measurment to asses wheight and height and BMI and also collect sociodemographic data from participant for Ex father and mother education and age ,sex,place of residence,father and mother jop, mean income.
and also collect data about hygine lnformation for Ex safe and cleen drink water , presence of toilet ,wash hand before and after eating and cooking ,clean nail .
Other data will be collected from participant about dietary habits for Ex how many times eating meat, paultary ,fish in week and how many times eating vegetable,fruits ege milk in day .
This all data will be analysed by use the proper statical analysis system and finally the results will obtained

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study asses the prevelance malnutrition in primary school children by using anthropometric measurment and asses the sociodemographic data and hygiene information and dietary habits affecting it

primary_outcome.measure: Height measure for the all participant
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measuring the height will take one month
primary_outcome.description: Height measure for the all participant in cm

primary_outcome.measure: Weight measure for the all participant
primary_outcome.time_frame: Weight measure for the all participant will take one month
primary_outcome.description: Weight measure for the all participant in kg
Sociodemographic data include father and mother education ,age , sex,mean out come, father and mother job,place of residence
Dietary habits as how many time eating meat ,fish , vegetable Fruits and another health food

arm_group.description: anthropometric measurment will take from each participiant in study to asses wheight ,height ,BMl and also use aquestionnaire yo asses the Sociodemographic data,dietary habits ,hygiene information

intervention.description: Anthropometric measurment used to asses the wheight in kelogram and asses height in cetemeter and also asses BMI

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy Children who agree the participate in study (6-12) years old .
- Both sexes.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children below sex years or above 12 years .
- children not in primary school .
- children who refuse participate in study.

reference.citation: Abdel Wahed WY, Hassan SK, Eldessouki R. Malnutrition and Its Associated Factors among Rural School Children in Fayoum Governorate, Egypt. J Environ Public Health. 2017;2017:4783791. doi: 10.1155/2017/4783791. Epub 2017 Oct 23.
